PublicService.name: Income Support for Mountainous and/or Disadvantaged Areas

evs.name: Tax Identification Number (TIN) Certificate
evs.description: Proof of the applicant’s Tax Identification Number.

evs.name: Certificate of Registration for EU, EEA, or Swiss Citizens
evs.description: A certificate (conditionally required) proving that the applicant is a citizen of the EU, the EEA, or Switzerland.

evs.name: Mayor’s Certificate for Two-Year Residency
evs.description: A certificate issued by the Mayor of the applicant’s place of residence, confirming at least two (2) years of continuous residence in the specific mountainous and disadvantaged area.

evs.name: Court Decision or Custody Assignment Order
evs.description: A court decision or an order assigning custody of a minor child, or a notarial act of recognition.

evs.name: Notarial Act of Child Recognition
evs.description: A notarial document confirming the recognition of the child.

evs.name: Authorization or Power of Attorney for a Third Party
evs.description: An authorization or a notarized power of attorney for the representation of the applicant.

criterion_requirements.name: Permanent residence in mountainous and/or disadvantaged areas for at least two (2) years before the application submission.
The annual family income of beneficiaries must not exceed four thousand seven hundred (4,700.00) euros.

At least one member of the family must be a citizen of: (a) The Hellenic Republic (Greece), (b) A European Union Member State, (c) A state belonging to the European Economic Area (Norway, Iceland, and Liechtenstein), (d) The Swiss Confederation.
